items.title: IPC Patient Management System
items.description: Comprehensive system for managing medical facilities and patients
items.content: Developed a comprehensive system for managing medical facilities and patients using cutting-edge technologies. The system includes appointment management, patient records, billing, and medical reports with an intuitive interface for doctors and staff.

items.title: Advanced E-commerce Platform
items.description: Complete online store with comprehensive management system
items.content: A sophisticated e-commerce platform supporting multiple payment methods, smart inventory management, membership system, and detailed sales reports. Features responsive design and high performance optimization.

items.title: Smart Real Estate Management System
items.description: Comprehensive platform for property and tenant management
items.content: An integrated real estate management system including property database, tenant management, payment tracking, property maintenance, and revenue reports with automated notifications.

items.title: Car Dealership Website
items.description: Integrated platform for car display and sales
items.content: A complete website for a car dealership including car display with photos and specifications, advanced search, inventory management system, and customer management with test drive appointment system.

items.title: Advanced Trading Automation Bot
items.description: Intelligent program for automated trading in financial markets
items.content: Developed an intelligent trading bot using advanced algorithms and historical data analysis to make automated trading decisions. Supports risk management and investment portfolio diversification.

items.title: OCR Text Recognition System
items.description: Smart tool for extracting text from images and documents
items.content: Developed an advanced text recognition system from images and scanned documents using artificial intelligence technologies. Supports multiple languages and converts documents to editable formats.

items.title: Smart Customer Service Bot
items.description: Intelligent assistant for responding to customer inquiries
items.content: Developed an intelligent customer service bot using natural language processing to respond to common inquiries, route conversations to appropriate staff, and provide initial technical support.

items.title: E-commerce Task Automation
items.description: Comprehensive automation solutions for e-commerce stores
items.content: Developed automation tools for inventory management, price updates, and automatic order processing in e-commerce stores. Includes competitor monitoring and automatic price adjustments.

items.title: Sales Data Analysis System
items.description: Comprehensive analysis tool for sales and customer data
items.content: Developed an advanced sales data analysis system with interactive dashboards and detailed reports for business decision making. Includes customer behavior analysis and sales forecasting.

items.title: Market Trends Analysis Platform
items.description: Advanced tool for monitoring financial market trends
items.content: A comprehensive platform for financial data analysis and market trend monitoring using machine learning techniques. Provides accurate price predictions and market sentiment analysis.

items.title: Website Performance Analysis System
items.description: Comprehensive tool for monitoring and analyzing website performance
items.content: An advanced system for monitoring website performance and analyzing visitor behavior. Provides detailed reports on loading speed, conversion rates, and user paths.

items.title: Interactive Business Dashboard
items.description: Comprehensive dashboard for monitoring key performance indicators
items.content: Developed an interactive dashboard for displaying key performance indicators for businesses. Collects data from multiple sources and displays it with clear visual representations with export capabilities.
